data.meanings: to pour out, spill (liquid), write a paper or a scroll, decide judicially.sijil - written scroll, writing-roll, deed, writ, judicial record, scribe.sijjil - hardened and petrified clay, stones of clay which had been written or decreed for them that they should be punished therewith, scroll of writing, scribe.
data.sentence: The word سِجِّيلٍ comes from the root س ج ل and is associated with the meanings: to pour out, spill (liquid), write a paper or a scroll, decide judicially.sijil - written scroll, writing-roll, deed, writ, judicial record, scribe.sijjil - hardened and petrified clay, stones of clay which had been written or decreed for them that they should be punished therewith, scroll of writing, scribe.
